short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new tab with a random word definition

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you bad with your definitions or you don't know the meaning of a word?
This extension will make every new tab you make to show a random word and its definition.
